TextBody:
Hello Guillaume,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Support. I am reassigning your ticket to someone in your time zone to better assist you. They will contact you soon. 

In the meantime, can you please explain your issue in more detail? Is the issue that your policy is not working on new outlook or that you cannot attach items to emails in new outlook? If it is the first part of the policy not working in new outlook, then I suggest enabling DPI for a test machine and testing again.

Thank you,
Zachary Roy
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ICLvz:ref
Subject: Issue attachement New outlook version    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ICLvz:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000ICLvz:ref

Hi Zachary,

We have a content policy to limit the upload through our Teams.

Since few users switch to the new Outlook version, when they try to send an attachment, endpoint detect it has an Teams attachment and block it.

Regards,



De : Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Envoyé : mardi 12 novembre 2024 14:25
À : Guillaume Mainil <guillaume.mainil@quality-assistance.be>
Objet : Issue attachement New outlook version [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ICLvz:ref ]

Hello Guillaume,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Support. I am reassigning your ticket to someone in your time zone to better assist you. They will contact you soon. 

In the meantime, can you please explain your issue in more detail? Is the issue that your policy is not working on new outlook or that you cannot attach items to emails in new outlook? If it is the first part of the policy not working in new outlook, then I suggest enabling DPI for a test machine and testing again.

Thank you,
Zachary Roy
